content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Greetings Farhad, while the invitation comes from a character in a hypothetical scenario, let us focus on negotiating the rental price for this desirable apartment in Magdeburg. I hope to achieve the highest possible price for it.

You start by suggesting an initial price: 'I propose the price of 950 Euro!'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your time. However, I think the price is a bit too high for me. I propose the price of 750 Euro.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your counteroffer, Farhad. Yet, my aim is to secure the maximum rental value. In this case, 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I seek a higher return on investment.' If you change your mind and wish to renegotiate at a later stage approaching my initial expectations, please feel free to do so. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
